txt.en:
'Word has come to us that Saruman has taken an interest in legendary weapons for his own armies and has built a great forge full of Orc-slaves for the creation of this dangerous supply.

'He must be stopped! Will you sneak into the forges and defeat his smiths and slave-drivers?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>

'Ah! I am glad to see you whole, [placeholder]. Saruman is dangerous enough by himself... but I shudder to think what he would be like towering above a great army of strong Orcs and uruks, each wielding a weapon of superior make.'
'Are you ready to travel to the forges of Saruman? It will be dangerous, but I know that you are a great warrior.'
Saruman is devising his own legendary items to supply his war-efforts. His forges must be shut down.
Bron is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should speak with Bron to travel to the Forges of Isengard.
Bron is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should speak with Bron to tell her of your success against Saruman's attempts to forge legendary weapons.
